software.title: Wildlife Tracker Pro
software.description: A comprehensive tool for tracking wildlife population dynamics using hierarchical models. Features real-time data visualization and export capabilities.

codes.title: Distance Sampling R Package
codes.description: Custom R scripts and functions for analyzing distance sampling data, optimizing detection probability estimation for complex terrains.

codes.title: R Markdown Basic
codes.description: This is an open public repository of Workshop on Rmarkdown for students in SCCS Bangalore 2024. Some of the important resources can be accessed using: https://github.com/yihui/xaringan and https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/index.html. For pdf output make sure you have a latex editor; one of the quickest is by running this command: tinytex::reinstall_tinytex(repository = 'Illinois'). Cookbook: https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/what-to-change.html. Citation style: https://www.zotero.org/styles?fields=anthropology
